text: U ewen kafir bune kom bi kom bal dojehe ve tene ajotin, heya gava hatine pere deren we vebun u dergevanen we ji wan re gotin ku: "Ma qey hin pexemberen ji we ku ayete perwerdekare we li ser we dixwendin u we bi pergihatina ve roja we ya han hiÃ¾yar dikirin-ditirsandin ji we re nehatin?" Gotin: "Bele cewa (nehatin).".Le bele peyva ezab li ser kafiran pewist buye
